name: Levelhead
description: Levelhead is a level building platformer with a challenging campaign for 1-4 players. Run, jump, and power-up through tons of levels in the handcrafted campaign, then build and publish levels for the world to play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2.5 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
